verbs.description: [ARG2: science experiment] explodes in teacher face [V: engulfing] [ARG1: her] [ARG2: in flames] a halloween experiment at a high school in metro atlanta went horribly wrong engulfing a teacher face in flames and sending her to the hospital gwinnett county morgan cook eddie kim bernard watson ga condaleeza waters cook atlanta principal eric h davidson science eric davidson mia vantassell experiment gwinnett county georgia duluth high school
